title: Oil Price Collapse Threatens to Scorch an Already-Nervous Stock Market - CCN.com
description: The US stock market looked poised to open lower as oil prices and dismal earnings cast a shadow over the recent rally
content:
• Oil prices slipped with weakening demand and worries about storage capacity.
  • Another week of miserable earnings is on tap as analysts warn that Q3 will be even worse.
  • A mix of coronavirus lockdown exit strategies across the world prove… [+4048 chars]
